report:
Premise: Five men, with matching red shirts, stand on the gymnasium floor in honor.

the men never showed up for the game

Premise: An older asian woman displaying bread for sale

A younger asian male displaying cookies for sale.

Premise: A skateboarder attempts to do a trick over a homemade ramp.

A skateboarder attempts a trick.

Premise: A person with tattoos is looking at a photo on a digital camera, or cellphone.

A person looks at a digital photo.

Premise: A man in a white shirt is sitting in front of a large amount of computer equipment.

A man is sitting down

Premise: Two men standing with an elephant next to a building.

People standing.

Premise: A baby carrying a ball in stands in front of a house with a hose in the background.

A baby is sitting in the high chair waiting to be fed.

Premise: Asian sports team in yellow and blue colors sitting on ground with a standing individual in a tiger mascot costume.

A sports team poses with the cheerleaders.

Premise: Two people sitting together on the base of a column.

There are people sitting next to a column in the museum.

Premise: A parade of women, dressed in blue and yellow and white dresses and matching headgear, walking down a street, while people on the sidewalk watch.

The women are snow skiing.
